TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableServiceClient extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The provides synchronous and asynchronous methods to perform table level operations with Azure Tables hosted in either Azure storage accounts or Azure Cosmos DB table API.
